ch_introduction: <chapter> <main_city.city> struggles with <enemy.struggle_reason>. They are the reason for <result.struggle_result>.
ch_quest_get: <chapter> In order to stop <enemy.struggle_reason> the party should head to <quest_giver_vocation.person_vocation> - <quest_giver.person>. This person will help party by providing information about <enemy.struggle_reason>.
ch_quest_history: <chapter> <quest_giver.person> was <quest_giver_attitude.attitude> to help. <quest_giver_vocation.person> tells the party that in order to defeat <enemy.struggle_reason> they need to find its source of power located in <enemy_place.place>.
twist2: uses its power to help poor people
ch_quest_end: <chapter> The party can decide whether they want to help <enemy.struggle_reason> or defeat <enemy.struggle_reason>. If they decide to help <enemy.struggle_reason> it turns out that <end>.
ch_end: <chapter> It seems like the end of the story, however party can find some clues that leads to different adventures.
end: they shouldn't, because they <what_they_did> the party.
